templates.description: Duck DNS is a free service which will point a DNS (sub domains of duckdns.org) to an IP of your choice. The service is completely free, and doesn't require reactivation or forum posts to maintain its existence. First, go to duckdns site, register your subdomain and retrieve your token. Then go back here and deploy the docker container with your subdomain(s) and token. It will update your IP with the DuckDNS service every 5 minutes.
templates.name: duckdns
templates.title: Duck DNS
templates.note:
Template created by darchap

Check my Github page: https://github.com/darchap/docker-templates

Official Webpage: https://www.duckdns.org/
Official Docker Documentation: https://docs.linuxserver.io/images/docker-duckdns

templates.description: Nginx Proxy Manager with sqlite and Goaccess Charts enables you to easily forward to your websites running at home or otherwise, including free SSL, without having to know too much about Nginx or Letsencrypt.

env.label: SKIP_ARCHIVED_LOGS
env.name: SKIP_ARCHIVED_LOGS
env.description: Defaults to false. Set to true to skip archived logs, i.e. proxy-host*.gz

env.label: BASIC_AUTH
env.name: BASIC_AUTH
env.description: Defaults to false. Set to true to enable nginx basic authentication. Docker container needs to stopped or restarted each time this flag is modified. This allows for the .htpasswd file to be changed accordingly.

env.label: BASIC_AUTH_USERNAME Ignore if Basic Auth set to false
env.name: BASIC_AUTH_USERNAME
env.description: (Optional) Requires BASIC_AUTH to bet set to true. Username for basic authentication.

env.label: BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD Ignore if Basic Auth set to false
env.name: BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD
env.description: (Optional) Requires BASIC_AUTH to bet set to true. Password for basic authentication.

templates.name: nginx-proxy-manager-sqlite-goaccess
templates.title: Nginx Proxy Manager with Sqlite and Goaccess Charts
templates.note:
Template created by darchap
